findings.title: Improved Order Validation Logic in SwapERC20
findings.description: In the audited `SwapERC20` contract, there is a helper routine `check()` that can be improved to add the `chainid` check as well.

findings.title: Suggested Use of Named Constant in SwapERC20::calculateDiscount()
findings.description: The `AirSwap` protocol has a built-in `SwapERC20` contract that allows for atomic `ERC20` token swap. While examining the logic to calculate the discount from the swap fee, we notice a minor improvement that may be made to enrich the code readability.
